It could run on any Android 4.0+ device , no need to root, and it is modified based on SmartProxy and Shadowsocks-Java This will disconnect the VPN connection, Are you sure to exit? The config URL is invalid. ss://method:password@host:port abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLIMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ?=.

Register>> Enter your password again Switch Account Help Contact Us Rate Us Privacy Policy Terms of Service account Tips: An account can only bind 2 devices login / register First login gift time or Tourist Mode old pass: Common Problem Why canot I connect ? 1.Please check if the current mobile phone network is unblocked and the wireless signal is stable. Try switching between WIFI and 4G signals. 2.Different network operators have different service line stability and speed. You can disconnect the VPN and try to reconnect. 3.You can restart your WIFI or 4G and try to reconnect. 4.The recommended width is greater than 4M, otherwise the speed may not be ideal. Need to deduct mobile phone traffic? VPN is only a proxy. If you use VPN on 3G/4G, the traffic fee is charged by the operator and has nothing to do with VPN. Can VPN break through the broadband speed of the home? No, VPN is equivalent to a foreign agent, and the speed cannot break the broadband speed of the home. How to change account? Click "My" in the lower left corner of the main interface to enter the user center, click on the bound mailbox, you can modify the account according to the prompts. How to change your password? Click "My" in the lower left corner of the main interface to enter the User Center, click Change Password, you can change the password according to the prompt. , The password can only be changed after the account has been modified to become a mailbox.
